A now page is an easy way to share a bird’s eye view of my recent activities and adventures. Instead of posting constant updates on social media, this page will provide a simple overview of what I’m up to.

If you are interested in learning more about now pages, Derek Sivers explains how he started the Now Pages Movement.

This page was last update 27-Jun-2020 OS. For more updates, send me an e-mail!
